amendment.description: An amendment numbered 15 printed in House Report 115-830 to increase funding to USGS to eradicate grass carp by $1 million, and reduce funding from the Office of the Interior Secretary by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Kildee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
